metadata.title: {ownerName} Dev | Portfolio
metadata.description: Welcome to the Coffee OS portfolio, inspired by desktop operating system layouts.
metadata.site_name: Hello, access and learn more about me and my projects.

owner_picture.title: {ownerName}'s photo taken at Beco Hexagonal restaurant.

paragraphs.1st: I am a passionate FullStack developer with solid experience in web projects. I graduated in Information Systems in 2020 and have been continuously improving since then.
paragraphs.2st: My main skills are in creating web applications using HTML, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript, and NodeJS. I am keen on acquiring new knowledge, especially about technologies, and strive to stay updated on the latest trends.
paragraphs.3st: A bit about myself: I am self-taught and in my free time, I like to study topics related to programming technologies. For fun and to keep fit, I go to the gym, and I also enjoy watching anime and reading manga. If I had to define myself, I would say I am a focused, dedicated, loyal, and supportive person, always seeking challenges that allow me to grow professionally.
